backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, settings, and per-user trade storage with Map-based persistence and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references for auditing development changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, including mappers, utilities, components, pages, and hooks involved in strategy preset logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and light/dark mode base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout configuration handling authentication, user profile gating, theming, and navigation structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginView.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with styled card UI and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit a name and create their profile with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/charts/EquityCur: Recharts line chart component rendering equity balance history with formatted axes and theming.
frontend/src/components/charts/MonthlyPe: Recharts bar chart displaying monthly pip performance with color-coded profit/loss bars and formatted tooltips.
frontend/src/components/charts/PairDistr: Renders a pie chart of trade counts per pair using Recharts, with custom colors and labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/SessionPe: Displays session-based bar charts for trades and win rate, including grid, legend, and formatted tooltips.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Provides a chat UI where users query trading metrics and receive ruleâ€‘based bot responses.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KpiGri: Shows a grid of key trading metrics with icons, colors, and formatted values.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeFor: Dialog for creating or editing trades, loading presets, syncing settings, and validating checklist items before saving.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradesTa: Renders a sortable trade table with status, discipline indicators, and edit/delete actions.
Layout wrapper with top bar, side navigation, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/shell/SideNav.ts: Vertical navigation menu highlighting active routes and linking to main sections.
frontend/src/components/shell/TopBar.tsx: Top header showing branding, user profile info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tools/Compoundin: Interactive compound growth tool with inputs for balance, return, and months, displaying results and a line chart.
frontend/src/components/tools/DrawdownRe: Calculates required return to recover from a drawdown and displays the value with a warning section.
frontend/src/components/tools/LotSizeCal: Computes risk amount, stop distance, and lot size from trading inputs, using settings defaults when available.
frontend/src/components/tools/PipCalcula: Computes price distance and pip count from entry, exit, and pip value inputs.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskOfRuin: Estimates risk of ruin based on win rate, average win/loss, and risk per trade, with risk assessment messaging.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskPercen: Calculates risk percentage from account size and risk amount using settings defaults.
frontend/src/domain/mappers.ts: Maps backend trade data to UI format and converts form data into a Trade object with calculated risk and violations.
frontend/src/domain/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for trades, forms, metrics, equity points, and performance distributions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, trades, and settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays trading KPIs and charts using trade data, with loading skeletons and tabbed analytics views.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Shows searchable trade history with CSV export, edit/delete actions, and a trade entry form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: A settings page that loads user preferences, displays a form, and saves updated settings via API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for multiple trading calculators like lot size, risk percent, pip, and drawdown tools.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Computes comprehensive performance metrics, equity curves, drawdowns, streaks, and risk consistency from trade data.
frontend/src/utils/breakdowns.ts: Generates monthly, pair-based, and session-based performance breakdowns from trades.
frontend/src/utils/chatbotRules.ts: Maps user queries to responses using trading performance metrics for a stats-focused chatbot.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Converts trades to CSV format and triggers browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, percentages, numbers, and dates.
frontend/src/utils/strategyPresets.ts: Parses and deduplicates newline-delimited strategy preset text into a clean list.
frontend/src/utils/toolsMath.ts: Provides math utilities for risk percent, compounding growth, drawdown recovery, and risk of ruin.
frontend/src/utils/tradingCalculations.t: Contains trading-related calculations such as risk amount, stop distance, lot size, R/R, profit/loss, and pip value.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus helpers for clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, custom color system, extended theme settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app goals, architecture notes, implemented features, and metadata for build planning.
